job_history.work_description: Strategize with management on all recruitment needs, build strong relationships with candidates and hiring managers, maintain accurate records, and provide mentoring and job coaching for employees.
Managed recruitment applicant tracking system, new hire onboarding, and benefits administration. Provided training, mentoring, and coaching, and maintained relationships with staffing vendors.
Managed employees, contributed to team effort, helped customers, and evaluated competition.

skills.name: Recruitment
skills.explanation: Strategized with management on recruitment needs and built strong relationships with candidates and hiring managers, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Relations
skills.explanation: Provided mentoring and job coaching for employees, maintained relationships with staffing vendors, and managed new hire onboarding, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Provided training, mentoring, and coaching to employees, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed employees as an Assistant Store Manager and contributed to team effort, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Maintained accurate records, provided mentoring and job coaching, and built strong relationships with candidates and hiring managers, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple responsibilities, including recruitment, new hire onboarding, and benefits administration, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Onboarding
skills.explanation: Managed new hire onboarding, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Benefits Administration
skills.explanation: Managed benefits administration, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Applicant Tracking System
skills.explanation: Managed recruitment applicant tracking system, indicating a solid working proficiency.
